subject: Self Care
title: Emotional Contagion
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Emotional Contagion.

hook.text: One anxious person in a meeting makes the entire room tense. Emotions spread faster than ideas do.

buildup.text: Mirror neurons fire when we observe others' emotions, causing us to unconsciously mimic and feel what they feel.

discovery.text: Leaders set the emotional tone. A calm leader calms the team. A panicked leader spreads panic instantly.

twist.text: You're both a transmitter and a receiver. Your emotional state affects others just as theirs affects yours.

climax.text: Manage your emotional broadcast. Before entering a room, ask: what energy am I about to spread to everyone?

punchline.text: Your mood is contagious. Broadcast it intentionally.

quiz.question: What causes emotional contagion between people?
options: Mirror neurons that fire when observing others' emotions
